about.title: About Platform
about.aboutTitle: An integrated digital advertising platform that helps you easily buy and sell products and services.
about.descriptionOne: This text is an example text that can be replaced in the same space. This text was generated from an Arabic text generator, where you can generate similar text or many other texts in addition to increasing the number of characters generated by the application. If you need more paragraphs, the Arabic text generator allows you to increase the number of paragraphs as desired. The text will not appear divided nor contain language errors. The Arabic text generator is useful for website designers in particular, as the client often needs to see a real image of the website design. Therefore, it is the designer's responsibility to place temporary texts on the design to show the client the complete form. The role of the Arabic text generator is to save the designer the trouble of searching for an alternative text unrelated to the topic that the design is about, so it appears in a fitting way.
about.descriptionTwo: Hence, the designer must place temporary texts on the design to show the client the complete form. The role of the Arabic text generator is to save the designer the trouble of searching for alternative text unrelated to the topic that the design is about, so it appears in a fitting way.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: We are here to answer your questions and help you at any time

faqs.question: What services does the website provide?
faqs.answer: The website provides a set of electronic services aimed at simplifying procedures and improving user experience, with the ability to manage and track requests electronically in full.

faqs.question: How can I create a new account?
faqs.answer: You can easily create a new account by going to the registration page and filling in the required information such as email, phone number, and password.

faqs.question: Can I use the website without registration?
faqs.answer: You can browse some basic services without registration, but to access all features and services, you need to create an account.

faqs.question: How can I send a contract request?
faqs.answer: You can send a contract request by filling out the dedicated form in the designated section and attaching all required documents and information.

faqs.question: How long does it take to review the contract?
faqs.answer: Contract review typically takes 3 to 5 business days depending on the number of requests and requirements.

faqs.question: What should I do if my contract is rejected?
faqs.answer: If your contract is rejected, you can contact our team to inquire about the reasons and submit a new request with the required modifications.

faqs.question: Can I modify the request after sending it?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can modify the request during the review period, but after approval, you may need additional procedures to make changes.
